result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Timoteo Sanchez-Mendez

records.addlTxt: 01:03 PM Defendant Timoteo Sanchez-Mendez not in court.  Elizabeth R. Gebert appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Bond poster is present. Court reviews status of case and asks State's position on bond. State does not wish to take position on the bond. S.P. believes Def is in custody with immigration in Milwaukee. Poster advises money was given to her to post by a family member of Def. Court would like to hold bond until status of deportation is known/finalized. State does not object. Court explains decision to S.P. Bond will not be forfeited or returned at this time.

Defendant Timoteo Sanchez-Mendez not in court.  Elizabeth R. Gebert appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Statement by Ms. Pranke.  Court has received letter from Ms. Pranke.  Letter read into the record.  State request that this matter be rescheduled.  Letter given to the district attorney.  Bail/Bond Forfeiture Hearing scheduled for December 5, 2018 at 01:00 pm.
Notice of Bail/Bond Forfeiture and Forfeiture Hearing

Defendant Timoteo Sanchez-Mendez not in court.  Elizabeth R. Gebert appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Called @ 12:02 p.m. Scheduled for 11:30 adjourned initial appearance. Def was in court when date was set. State requests warrant $1500 or body, statewide for reasons stated. Court authorizes warrant $1500 or body, statewide. Court forfeits $1000 bond subject to hearing.
Acknowledgement by Bail Depositor
Bond Receipt

ADDRESS INFO for Timoteo Sanchez-Mendez
Current: W1388 State Hwy 29, Curtiss, WI 54422 United States  (Effective: 08-28-2018)
Prior: N1245 Evergreen Road, Birnamwood, WI 54414
Bail bond
No driving a motor vehicle without a valid driver's license.  No presence in establishments with Class B liquor license.  No illegal use or possession of controlled substances     No use of alcohol.

Defendant Timoteo Sanchez-Mendez in court, via video, in custody.  Elizabeth R. Gebert appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court reviews court record.   Warrant to be vacated, state presents arguments for bond, higher cash bond.  Bond set by court.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for October 17, 2018 at 11:30 am.

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Timoteo Sanchez-Mendez not in court.  Galen Bayne-Allison appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Called at 2:55 pm.  Statement by Atty Bayne-Allison.  State request bond be forfeited.  Notices have been sent.  Court will forfeit $500. and warrant remains

Defendant Timoteo Sanchez-Mendez not in court.  Galen Bayne-Allison appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court calls  @ 9:40 am.  State moves to fofeit & request warrant, $1500.00.  Court forfeits bond pending hearing & orders warrant $1500.00 cash

Defendant Timoteo Sanchez-Mendez in court.  Galen Bayne-Allison appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Called @ 9:53 a.m. Interpreter Teresa Berger duly sworn on oath. Def has already received copy of complaint. Charges, possible penalties, atty rights reviewed. Def given phone number for public defender and petition for court-appointed atty in Spanish. Def to have public defender or have completed petition before next hrg. Interpreter may appear by telephone.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for August 23, 2016 at 09:30 am.
OWI 2nd & OAR
of Intent to Suspend Operating Privilege

Bail Bond
Clerk's Minutes filed.
